item.title: What would my main-class be? 317 pi please help
item.dc:creator: @Pker_DX Pker DX
item.description:
@Pker_DX wrote:

[quote=“Dent145, post:1, topic:508861”]in my run.bat it has

@echo off
title Running Project Old School
java -Xmx256m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

in the tuts i read it says in the run.bat it should specify what the main-class would be like it should say client ive seen example i have jarred other clients correctly just this one wont work i upload it to my site using the client for main-class and it does download the cache and it unzips it correctly but after it unzips it it gives connection error because i even used and unjarred client me and my friend and it loads the same cache that the webclient uses no problem. Please help thanks in advanced[/quote]
Client.class

Read full topic

item.title: What would my main-class be? 317 pi please help

item.description:
@Dent145 wrote:

in my run.bat it has

@echo off
title Running Project Old School
java -Xmx256m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
pause

in the tuts i read it says in the run.bat it should specify what the main-class would be like it should say client ive seen example i have jarred other clients correctly just this one wont work i upload it to my site using the client for main-class and it does download the cache and it unzips it correctly but after it unzips it it gives connection error because i even used and unjarred client me and my friend and it loads the same cache that the webclient uses no problem. Please help thanks in advanced
